nodes.text: Yallenkeljo was a male Human Jedi who served the Jedi Order aboard the space station Carrick Station, selling combat gear during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the resurgent Sith Empire.

Yallenkeljo first appeared in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011, as a PvP Ranked Gear Vendor for the Jedi Consular. Yallen's appearance and gear was changed with the release of Game Update 2.0, when the elder game gear system was overhauled; Yallenkeljo was changed from a yellow-skinned Twi'lek to a masked Human. He was later removed in Game Update 5.0 on November 29, 2016, which retired the PvP and PvE gear vendors in favor of the Command system.
